title: Post Game: The guest who got away and the Senate run that wasn't
description: Chuck gets off the set and sits down with NBC News Congressional correspondent Leigh Ann Caldwell to talk about their takeaways from interviews with Gov. Chris Sununu (R-N.H.), Brian Deese, and Rep. Adam Schiff (D-Calif.)
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
